io.cert-manager.v1.Certificate.description: A Certificate resource should be created to ensure an up to date and signed X.509 certificate is stored in the Kubernetes Secret resource named in spec.secretName.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

io.cert-manager.v1.CertificateSpec.description: CertificateSpec defines the desired state of Certificate.

secretName.description: Name of the Secret resource that will be automatically created and managed by this Certificate resource to store the X.509 certificate.

issuerRef.description: Reference to the issuer responsible for issuing the certificate.

commonName.description: Requested common name X509 certificate subject attribute.

renewBefore.description: How long before the currently issued certificate's expiry cert-manager should renew the certificate.

ipAddresses.description: Requested IP address subject alternative names.

privateKey.description: Options to control private keys used for the Certificate.

usages.description: Requested key usages and extended key usages.

revisionHistoryLimit.description: The maximum number of CertificateRequest revisions that are maintained in the Certificate's history.

io.cert-manager.v1.CertificatePrivateKey.description: CertificatePrivateKey contains configuration options for private keys used by the Certificate controller.

algorithm.description: Algorithm is the private key algorithm of the corresponding private key for this certificate.

encoding.description: The private key cryptography standards (PKCS) encoding for this certificate's private key to be encoded in.

rotationPolicy.description: RotationPolicy controls how private keys should be regenerated when a re-issuance is being processed.

size.description: Size is the key bit size of the corresponding private key for this certificate.

io.cert-manager.v1.CertificateStatus.description: CertificateStatus defines the observed state of Certificate.

conditions.description: List of status conditions to indicate the status of certificates.

notAfter.description: The expiration time of the certificate stored in the secret.

notBefore.description: The time after which the certificate stored in the secret is valid.

renewalTime.description: RenewalTime is the time at which the certificate will be next renewed.

revision.description: The current revision count for the Certificate.

io.cert-manager.v1.CertificateCondition.description: CertificateCondition contains condition information for a Certificate.

reason.description: Reason is a brief machine readable explanation for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Message is a human readable description of the details of the last transition.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the timestamp corresponding to the last status change of this condition.

io.cert-manager.v1.ObjectReference.description: ObjectReference is a reference to an object with a given name, kind and group.

name.description: Name of the resource being referred to.

kind.description: Kind of the resource being referred to.

group.description: Group of the resource being referred to.

io.cert-manager.v1.Issuer.description: An Issuer represents a certificate issuing authority which can be referenced as part of issuerRef fields.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

io.cert-manager.v1.IssuerSpec.description: IssuerSpec is the specification of an Issuer.

acme.description: ACME configures this issuer to communicate with an RFC 8555 (ACME) server to obtain signed x509 certificates.

ca.description: CA configures this issuer to sign certificates using a signing CA keypair stored in a Secret resource.

selfSigned.description: SelfSigned configures this issuer to self-sign certificates.

io.cert-manager.v1.ACMEIssuer.description: ACMEIssuer contains the specification for an ACME issuer.

server.description: Server is the URL used to access the ACME server's directory endpoint.

email.description: Email is the email address to be associated with the ACME account.

privateKeySecretRef.description: PrivateKey is the name of a Kubernetes Secret resource that will be used to store the ACME account private key.

solvers.description: Solvers is a list of challenge solvers that will be used to solve ACME challenges for the matching domains.

skipTLSVerify.description: If true, skip verifying the ACME server TLS certificate.

io.cert-manager.v1.ACMEChallengeSolver.description: An ACMEChallengeSolver describes how to solve ACME challenges.

dns01.description: Configures cert-manager to attempt to complete authorizations by performing the DNS01 challenge flow.

http01.description: Configures cert-manager to attempt to complete authorizations by performing the HTTP01 challenge flow.

selector.description: Selector selects a set of DNSNames on the Certificate resource that should be solved using this challenge solver.

io.cert-manager.v1.SecretKeySelector.description: A reference to a specific key within a Secret resource.

name.description: Name of the Secret resource being referred to.

key.description: The key of the entry in the Secret resource's data field to be used.

io.cert-manager.v1.CAIssuer.description: CAIssuer configures an issuer that can issue certificates using a signing CA keypair.

secretName.description: SecretName is the name of the secret used to sign Certificates issued by this Issuer.

crlDistributionPoints.description: The CRL distribution points is an X.509 v3 certificate extension which identifies the location of the CRL from which the revocation of this certificate can be checked.

io.cert-manager.v1.SelfSignedIssuer.description: Configures an issuer to self-sign certificates.

crlDistributionPoints.description: The CRL distribution points is an X.509 v3 certificate extension.

io.cert-manager.v1.IssuerStatus.description: IssuerStatus contains status information about an Issuer.

conditions.description: List of status conditions to indicate the status of an Issuer.

io.cert-manager.v1.IssuerCondition.description: IssuerCondition contains condition information for an Issuer.

reason.description: Reason is a brief machine readable explanation for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Message is a human readable description of the details of the last transition.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the timestamp corresponding to the last status change of this condition.

io.cert-manager.v1.ClusterIssuer.description: A ClusterIssuer represents a certificate issuing authority which can be referenced as part of issuerRef fields. It is similar to an Issuer, however it is cluster-scoped and therefore can be referenced by resources that exist in any namespace.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

io.k8s.apimachinery.pkg.apis.meta.v1.Obj.description: ObjectMeta is metadata that all persisted resources must have.

name.description: Name must be unique within a namespace.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which each name must be unique.

labels.description: Map of string keys and values that can be used to organize and categorize objects.

annotations.description: Annotations is an unstructured key value map stored with a resource that may be set by external tools.
